file_content.text: Watch your step, Jedi.
Good show! I never liked that Jedi, nor his pathetic Republic. No feel for business.
The Empire, on the other hand... them I could work with. Maybe even split the Quesh venom business. Whaddaya say?
The Empire could use a loyal servant like you, Broga.
We'll work something out.
I knew you'd recognize a good deal. I'll just catch my breath here until all your friends know I'm on their side.
Nice try, Broga, but you're not weaseling out of this.
I'm not buying. [Kill Broga]
Why did you uproot me, Jedi? My palace was set up just the way I like it!
Quiet, Broga. We're not alone.
Once again, the Empire sends its best. Futile. Quesh will always be the Republic's.
My lightsaber will cure your confidence.
You're finished, Fraal.
Your screams will ring in Quesh's Imperial rule.
You're finished, Fraal.
Valiant last words for a doomed Jedi. Are you done?
I hope you're ready to die.
Enough babble. Time to kill you.
Less talking, more dying.
We're just here to ruin your operation and spark galactic war.
The Empire's not after Quesh.
The Republic won't take your bait. Not while I breathe.
Surrender is your only hope.
Just try to defeat me.
You're outnumbered, Fraal. Take my adrenals. They'll help you rip the scum apart!
True Jedi need only the Force.
Take my adrenals, Fraal. Then you'll really cut this scum to pieces!
Your strength is impressive, Sith. But no amount of power will take Quesh from the Republic.
So, Intelligence is now interested in Quesh. Whatever you're trying, this planet will always be the Republic's.
Your war is foolish. Quesh will always be the Republic's.
I fight because I'm paid to.
Then your lust for credits has sealed your fate.
